about_the_game:
The king has asked the bravest of the brave to come to his aid. The kingdom is overwhelmed by vermin, scum and monsters. Slay them all, chop them up, make a statement, help the citizens survive for just one more night. Fight alone or with up to 4 of your friends in co-op. There's a new warrior in town ready to purge the dungeons, and if you don't succeed, I'm sure there's plenty of others in line looking to make a quick fortune.

Play in co-op!
Play alone or with a team up to 4 people.

Missions to help the kingdom!
Travel to various dungeons to complete missions. Stock up in your local tavern with provisions and gear for longer and more difficult journeys and missions. Cleanse and purge the old sorcerer dungeon, or find a missing person, stupid enough to be kidnapped by vicious goblins.

Defend the city from a goblin invasion!
If you don't close down dungeons, the enemies see their chance and attack the city. Prepare for emergent quests!

Gear up and become the warrior of choice!
Fighting in the dungeons ain't easy. Make sure to pick the right weapon for the job. Equip a various set of gear, light for better dodging or heavier to be able to take a punch. The gear you pick, decides what playstyle you want. Play defensively with a sword and shield, or aggressively with a two handed sword.

Key Features

  • Explore multiple randomly generated dungeons.

  • Hire helpers so you have a better chance of making it back from multi day missions.

  • Defend the city when it's being attacked.

  • Play alone or in co-op.

  • Choose your own playstyle by picking the right weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 3.x GHz
  • Graphics: 1080Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Your motherboard will do a fine job of blips and blops
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: We're not making Crysis here
